location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Fig. 6 The Former Extension of Lake Urmia (after de Morgan)’

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Map of the Lake Urmia produced to illustrate the geology of Mesopotamia and surrounding region based on Jacques de Morgan’s research. The extent of the Lake Urmia shore line during Pliocene shown by pecked line with the highest and lowest levels of the present lake indicated by red and blue line respectively.
